pages.title: Dark Chest
pages.text: You already own so much stuff that by the time you find what you need in your piles of chests, you forget why you were looking. Thanks to the peculiar properties of dark metal you crafted a chest many times larger than a regular or even a double chest.
Moreover, dark diamonds let you project the light from the item in the special slot straight into the showcase window.
Not only the item appears there, but also its name. That lets you label chests by renaming an item on an anvil. The end result was worth every effort.
